title: How many square feet are there in 288 square inches? Note that 1 foot = 12 inches. - Quora

response.answer_text: Method 1: 288 square inches = 288 x (inch)² or 288 square inches = 288 x (inch x inch) or 288 square inches = 288 x (1/12 foot) x (1/12 foot) (1 foot = 12 inches as per the question. So, 1 inch or simply, inch = 1/12 foot) or 288 square inches = 288 x (1/12 x 1/12) (foot x foot) or 288 square inches = 288 x (1/144) (foot)² or 288 square inches = 288 x 1/144 (foot)² or 288 square inches = 288/144 (foot)² or 288 square inches = 2 x (foot)² or 288 square inches = 2 square feet (foot² = square feet) Therefore, the answer is 2 square feet. ———————————————————————————————————— Method 2: 1 square inch = 1 x (inch)² or 1 square inch = 1 x (inch x inch) or 1 square inch = 1 x (1/12 foot) x (1/12 foot) (1 foot = 12 inches as per the question. So, 1 inch or simply, inch = 1/12 foot) or 1 square inch = 1 x (1/12 x 1/12 )(foot x foot) or 1 square inch = 1 x (1/144)(foot)² or 1 square inch = 1 x 1/144 (foot)² or 1 square inch = 1 x 1/144 square feet (foot² = square feet) Therefore, 288 square inches = 288 x 1/144 square feet. or 288 square inches = 288/144 square feet. or 288 square inches = 2 square feet. Therefore, the answer is 2 square feet.

Q. How many square feet are there in 288 square inches? Note that 1 foot = 12 inches. Solution. Given that 1 foot = 12 inches ⇒ 1 x 1 = 12 x 12 ⇒ 1 ft² = 144 inches² ⇒ 1 inch² = 1/144 ft² Thetefore, 288 inches² = 1/144 x 288 = 2 ft² Answer 288 inches² is equal to 2 ft²
